title: Sundial Watch
summary: Sundial watch face for Android Wear
description: Watch face that shows the time (hours & minutes), month and day of month.Different facets of the Gnonom are displayed based on watch orientation, creating a 3D effect.Designed for square, round and Moto 360 Android Wear watches.Ambient mode also displays the time (hours & minutes), month and day of month.Select either static or dynamic Gnomon shadow (static by default) from the watch settings (more battery usage).Shadow will not be displayed between 8 pm and 4 am by default. Use watch settings to set location and select sunrise to sunset shadow type, or select 24 hr shadow.Please rate and review, and do check out our other designs as well.Please email us if you face any issues or have any suggestions. We'll be happy to hear from you.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face that shows the time (hours & minutes), month and day of month.

Different facets of the Gnonom are displayed based on watch orientation, creating a 3D effect.

Designed for square, round and Moto 360 Android Wear watches.

Ambient mode also displays the time (hours & minutes), month and day of month.
Select either static or dynamic Gnomon shadow (static by default) from the watch settings (more battery usage).

Shadow will not be displayed between 8 pm and 4 am by default. Use watch settings to set location and select sunrise to sunset shadow type, or select 24 hr shadow.

Please rate and review, and do check out our other designs as well.

Please email us if you face any issues or have any suggestions. We'll be happy to hear from you.
comments: Sometimes you need to go retro, and what could be better than this? Very nicely done!
Excelent but still with margin for improvement. Please, more options, including different dial colors.
